mapper.select: select ot.order_date, ot.order_no, ot.order_status, (select product_name from product where product_id = pd.product_id) product_name, od.product_detail_id, od.quantity, ot.total_price from orderTbl ot left join order_detail od on ot.order_id = od.order_id left join product_detail pd on od.product_detail_id = pd.product_detail_id left join product p on p.product_id = pd.product_id where ot.member_id = #{memberId}
